body: That is what you call gaping

NTR is getting lazier and lazier. Same 3-5 plots over and over no matter what characters are being used regardless if its doujinshi or "original" works. Rape, blackmail or "she was a whore the whole time" plots make up like 98% of what comes out nowdays. EDIT: I just glossed over it and now saw it falls into the third category. Saimin Seishidou 5&6 can't come soon enough. Hypno blink might be the only recent series you could say is "NTR" (via mind control) worth reading.
@Blankroom Well then I'm going to commission the gyaru ntr then.
I like amano ntr cus that meand gyariu girl wins and she's way better
NTR is cool and all but the best vanillas are just leagues above the best NTRs so here's to hoping that this seris gets a better doujin
